page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW OF THE BLOCK
page.content: The block although situated on the N.W. side of the Potteries could not be described as a solely industrial area. It contains a variety of types of land cover,and this is reflected in the character of the area.A large part of the area is land that is being,or has been reclaimed or redeveloped,however the area itself has retained much of its traditional character. The Potteries is a very insular area,and the N.W. corner reflects this.Each area has its own identity,and this is also evident in the text. It is predominantly a mixture of residential and industrial land,with a large proportion of open space.
